website.title: Create a countdown timer for your website in minutes. It'easy and free.
website.description: Create a countdown timer for your website in minutes. No coding required. Customize the timer to match your brand and embed it in your website in seconds.
website.keywords: countdown timer, free countdown timer, easy countdown timer, online countdown timer, simple countdown timer, website countdown timer, wordpress countdown timer, online store countdown timer, e-commerce countdown timer, free e-commerce countdown timer, easy e-commerce countdown timer, online e-commerce countdown timer, simple e-commerce countdown timer, e-commerce countdown timer for website e-commerce countdown timer for wordpress, e-commerce countdown timer for woocommerce, e-commerce countdown timer for shopify, e-commerce countdown timer for squarespace, e-commerce countdown timer for webflow, e-commerce countdown timer for wix, e-commerce countdown timer for hotmart, e-commerce countdown timer for gutenberg countdown timer for elementor, countdown timer for divi, countdown timer for oxygen, countdown timer for bricks, countdown timer for beaver builder, countdown timer for visual composer, countdown timer for checkout, countdown timer for cart, countdown timer for checkout

hero.headline: Create a countdown timer for your website in minutes.
hero.subsubheadline: Try our user-friendly editor now and see the difference it makes in your store and website's conversions. No coding required. Customize the timer to match your brand and embed it in your website in seconds.

0.title: Sales and special promotions
0.body: A countdown timer can be used to create a sense of urgency and increase conversion rates during a sale or promotion event.

1.title: Product launches
1.body: A countdown timer can be used to build anticipation and interest before the launch of a new product.

2.title: Events
2.body: A countdown timer can be used to count down the days, hours, and minutes until an important event such as a concert, conference, or sporting event.

3.title: Delivery deadlines
3.body: A countdown timer can be used to show how much time is left for the delivery of an order or to inform customers about shipping deadlines.

4.title: Special event countdown
4.body: A countdown timer can be used to count down the days, hours and minutes until a special event such as Christmas, New Year's Eve or a holiday.

5.title: Advertising campaigns
5.body: A countdown timer can be used to create anticipation and interest before the deadline to sign up or purchase a product or service.

6.title: Limited-time offers
6.body: A countdown timer can be used to show how much time is left to take advantage of a limited-time offer.

reasons.headline: Four reasons to use a countdown timer

0.title: Motivate your visitors to take action
0.body: Make your visitors afraid of losing too much and compel them to buy immediately. The time remaining until completion of the term will be displayed, creating a sense of urgency.

1.title: Encourage your visitors to buy
1.body: Don't allow your prospects too much time to consider; instead, display the Clockdown timer for each visitor to encourage them to buy before time expires.

2.title: Awakens a sense of urgency
2.body: One of the strongest senses for mental triggers is that of urgency, the fear of missing a good opportunity. Use the countdown timer and trigger this feeling in your customers.

3.title: Faster buying decision
3.body: Just choose when the Clockdown ends and provide a message that will appear next to the timer, with this simple trick you will motivate the customer to take action faster.

0.title: Unique templates that adapt to any theme
0.body: There are themes for all tastes, but if you still can't find yours, you can always create it from scratch. It's quick and easy, just choose the colors and style you want.

1.title: For any device
1.body: Responsive counter templates for your website, blog, online store. You can use them on any device, be it a smartphone, tablet or desktop.

2.title: Customization for your business
2.body: With a few clicks you create and edit your counter. Choose the colors, style and format you want, you can even change the background color. It's easy and fast.

0.title: Choose the date and time zone for your countdown timer
0.body: Your customers are spread all over the world? No problem with that.

1.title: Customize
1.body: Customize the template with the colors and style you want.

2.title: Generate and copy the code
2.body: This is where the magic happens.

3.title: Paste the code into your site and start using it

pricing.headline: Pricing
pricing.subheadline: We simplify everything, regardless of the size of your business and the traffic to your site.

starter.headline: Starter
starter.subheadline: Let's start here and grow together

quote.text: Better three hours too early than one minute too late.
quote.explanation: In this quote from 'The Merry Wives of Windsor,' Shakespeare alluded to the benefits of doing something early rather than missing an opportunity. Fight your procrastination, even if it means doing something long before the deadline.

htmlEmbeddedCode.modalDescription: Embed the countdown in your website. Press the button below to copy the code.
htmlEmbeddedCode.linkDisclaimer: The timer contains a link to our website, you can remove it upgrading to the premium version.
htmlEmbeddedCode.howToText: Add the timer to your website, choose your platform and follow the instructions:

upgradeCTA.variant2: Take a look at the features

popover.title: Premium User
popover.body: Becoming a premium user will let you customize and manage your countdowns without any limitations.

body.default: This feature is only available in the premium version. Become a premium member to unlock it.
body.newCountdown: Unlock the premium version to create an unlimited number of timers: set a timer for each planned discount campaign or customize the timer look for your different landing pages.

firstCountdown.body: You don't have any countdowns yet. Click the button below to create the first one.

countdown_edit_new.createSuccess: Now you can edit the countdown.

countdown_edit_edit.updateSuccess: Now you can edit the countdown.

countdown_edit_delete.body: This will delete the countdown and all its data. This action cannot be undone.

targetDate.title: Target date
targetDate.description: Set the date and time when the countdown will end.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Set the timezone of the countdown.

auto.title: Auto layout
auto.description: The layout is choosed automatically based on the screen size.
auto.label: Auto

vertical.title: Vertical layout
vertical.description: The title is on top of the countdown and the timer is on the bottom despite the screen size
vertical.label: Vertical

horizontal.title: Horizontal layout
horizontal.description: The title is on the left of the countdown despite the screen size
horizontal.label: Horizontal

separator.showSeparatorAriaLabel: Show the separator in the timer

onboarding.newsletterConsent: I would like to sign up for your newsletter, but only if you promise not to bother me (approx. 1-2 per month). I am aware that I can unsubscribe whenever I choose.
onboarding.privacyAndTermsConsent: Your terms and conditions are acceptable to me. I read the privacy policy, I am aware that you care about my privacy and will never share my data with anyone.
onboarding.consentStatement:
By clicking, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service.
Read our Privacy Policy.
